nodes.text: Beginnings was a painting available in the galaxy during the Galactic Civil War sometime after the Battle of Yavin. It depicted an erupting volcano on the surface of the planet Mustafar.

Beginnings appeared in Trials of Obi-Wan, a 2005 expansion pack for the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, which shut down on December 15, 2011.. It could be used as decoration in the player's house. It was obtained by inserting three Force-infused items—a shisha, a recording rod, and an ammo box—into the Chu-Gon Dar cube, a Jedi relic capable of transmogrification through the Force. These items were looted from the corpses of the various enemies found on Mustafar.
